{% verbatim %}

Module Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::Block::BlockType

Type of a block (text, image etc) as identified by OCR.

Constants

UNKNOWN

value: 0
Unknown block type.

TEXT

value: 1
Regular text block.

TABLE

value: 2
Table block.

PICTURE

value: 3
Image block.

RULER

value: 4
Horizontal/vertical line box.

BARCODE

value: 5
Barcode block.

{% endverbatim %}
